column4: i have some program that emails me security issues with my mail server on my netbsd box.. is there something similar to that for ubuntu?
depends what you want to be mailed about !!
too many to list.. what do you need...
i want to know when i need to update things amostly
personally I install "cron-apt" which does a check daily for packages
i beleive you can tell it to.. i don't tell it to though
my ubuntu server says cron-apt is referred to by another pkg and has no installation canidate
